TopicTitle: Made a payment via PayPal, not allowed to download.

Articles.Content: Made a payment of 15$ USD via PayPal @ 9:17 AM - was not directed to a download link at all... what the [fuzzy bunny]?

Products Purchased

Order ID Product Name Amount Date

Nothing there - yet...

You sent a payment of $15.00 USD to Electro Chango S.A. de C.V.

([email protected]) !

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Please keep the language clean, there are children about.

As to your order, please read this notice http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=10846.0.

Have patience as orders are currently being manually processed.

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

They announced that they are having problems with the ordering server (or something along that line I cannot remember) and that they are processing the orders manually, Please be patient as they get your order out to you.

The problem they are having was announced HERE.

This is an issue with PayPal, which we hope will be resolved soon, but in the meantime the guys are working overtime processing orders manually. Patience is needed!

Alright, so what\'s the current turn around for it being placed on my account to download?

Sorry for the language earlier.

Please follow the links and see the topic(s) in the support forum; You might need to find the paypal receipt in your email inbox and send it to the Support email address (which you can find in one of Alex\'s post, or on the Contact page of the main KSP website.

Again, please take all inquiries about this issue to This Topic: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=10846.0
